items.name: Paper Towels
items.description: Super absorbent to take on spills, general cleaning, and... whatever else! Why messy up a towel when it's paper time, baby!

items.name: Cheerios
items.description: This classic barely needs an introduction... a delicious, nutritious, and perfect start to your day. Taste the O's! Better with milk!

items.name: Toothpaste
items.description: Extra whitening foam action for your teeth! Make them white, make them shine. But most of all... keep 'em clean!

items.name: Soap
items.description: It cleans things that are dirty.

items.name: Shampoo
items.description: Now can be used on hair!

items.name: Mystery Meat
items.description: Is it beef? Is it pork? Chicken? Something else entirely?? It's a surprise! And always on sale for an unbeatable price.

items.name: Spice Pack
items.description: Perfect for making food taste better. We know you can't do it on your own.

items.name: Pet Food
items.description: Have an animal friend that needs to eat? Look no further!

items.name: Doritos
items.description: You're not going to eat potato chips, are you? When you need a salty, zesty and tasty snack, look no further. Stock up while you can!
